summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 32, Pontius 2nd Addition, Supplemental, being the alley between Melrose Avenue North and Bellevue Avenue North, from East Republican Street to East Mercer Street; all in The City of Seattle; all in accordance with Petition No. 85150, to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds", and declaring an emergency.
